Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Server

Class ServerRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Server.ServerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceRMI, Serializable, Remote
public class ServerRMI extends Object implements InterfaceRMI, Serializable
This is the class that represents the server for RMI that communicate with GameThread in order to perform the commands
See Also:

    • draw

      public void draw(String nickname, String cardType, int card) throws RemoteException
      Method that create the Message with the information for the draw and send it to the ServerMessageSorter
      Specified by:
      draw in interface InterfaceRMI
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the player who wants to draw
      cardType - is the type of the card that the player wants to draw (i.e. gold or resource)
      card - is an integer that allows the controller to know which card draw
      Throws:
      RemoteException - -

    • playACard

      public void playACard(int card, int x, int y, boolean face, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Method that create the Message with the information for the play of a card and send it to the ServerMessageSorter
      Specified by:
      playACard in interface InterfaceRMI
      Parameters:
      card - is the card to play
      x - the x coordinates where to play the card
      y - the x coordinates where to play the card
      face - is how the card has to be played, face up or face down
      nickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to play the card, used to get the game id
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote
